StuffTheSpire:NeowsTribute.NAME: Neows Tribute
StuffTheSpire:NeowsTribute.FLAVOR: It is said, that Neow rewards those who have achieved great things.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click during Combat: Consume 1 Charge to gain 1 Intangible. Defeat Elites to gain Charges.

StuffTheSpire:RunicHypercube.NAME: Runic Hypercube
StuffTheSpire:RunicHypercube.FLAVOR: It seems to shift in size and shape. Strange.
DESCRIPTIONS: After the first turn of combat gain #b3 [E] and draw #b5 additional cards at the start of each turn. NL At the end of your turn count the total cost of all cards in your hand. NL Loose that much [E] and draw fewer cards equal to the total cost next turn.

StuffTheSpire:Mouthbags.NAME: Mouthbags
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup choose a card and increase it's damage and block by #b4.
Choose a card to improve

StuffTheSpire:CocoNut.NAME: Coconut
StuffTheSpire:CocoNut.FLAVOR: If you eat to much you'll get very fat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup gain #b5 max HP. At the start of each combat gain #b3 #ystuffthespire:Juggernaut.

StuffTheSpire:Expresso.NAME: Cup of Expresso
StuffTheSpire:Expresso.FLAVOR: Made from delicious java code beans.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn reduce the cost of one of the cheapest cards in you hand to #b0 for one turn.

StuffTheSpire:DullRazor.NAME: Dull Razor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn trigger the effects of all cards, relics and powers that have an effect when taking damage.

StuffTheSpire:PointBlank.NAME: Point Blank
DESCRIPTIONS: Attacks that target multiple enemies deal #b50% more damage if only one enemy is in the room.

StuffTheSpire:Nightcore.NAME: Nightcore
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat gain #b2 #ystuffthespire:Dark_fade.

StuffTheSpire:Kangaroo.NAME: Paper Kängäröö
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn reduce #yall #yBuffs and #yDebuffs by #b1 (Increase them if you have negative stacks). Whenever you gain a #yBuff, increase it by #b2.

StuffTheSpire:Wildfire.NAME: Wild Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 #yAttacks in one turn, add a #ySkill from your draw pile to your hand.

StuffTheSpire:GrapeVine.NAME: Grape Vine
DESCRIPTIONS: Every third #yAttack you play applies #b2 #ystuffthespire:constricted.

StuffTheSpire:HeavyRock.NAME: Rolling Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn gain 3 #yDexterity until the end of the turn or until you play a skill.

StuffTheSpire:MyLittleGreenCactus.NAME: My little green Cactus
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal non-attack and non-hp-loss damage, apply #b1 #yPoison.

StuffTheSpire:Tea.NAME: High Noon Tea
DESCRIPTIONS: For every twelve cards you play, reduce the cost of all #yAttacks in your hand by #b1 for one turn.

StuffTheSpire:HistoryBook.NAME: History Book
StuffTheSpire:HistoryBook.FLAVOR: Your entire past and future is written down here
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards in your draw pile are now always sorted in the order they were added to your deck.

StuffTheSpire:WitherSkull.NAME: Withered Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: While below 50% of your max. HP apply #b2 Poison to all enemies at the end of your turn.

StuffTheSpire:Gunfinga.NAME: Gunfinga
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn gain 3 #yStrength until the end of the turn or until you play an attack.

StuffTheSpire:ForceGauntlet.NAME: Force Gauntlet
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attack damage is increased by #b20%

StuffTheSpire:RunicConfusion.NAME: Runic Confusion
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. You can no longer see Card descriptions and Costs.

StuffTheSpire:RubySignet.NAME: Ruby Signet
StuffTheSpire:RubySignet.FLAVOR: The Ruby comes alive when you are burning to heal your wounds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b2 Hp whenever Vulnerable is applied to you

StuffTheSpire:SapphireSignet.NAME: Sapphire Signet
StuffTheSpire:SapphireSignet.FLAVOR: The Sapphire comes alive when you are frozen to heal your wounds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b2 Hp whenever Frail is applied to you.

StuffTheSpire:EmeraldSignet.NAME: Emerald Signet
StuffTheSpire:EmeraldSignet.FLAVOR: The Emerald comes alive when you are poisoned to heal your wounds.
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b2 Hp whenever Weak is applied to you.

StuffTheSpire:MayFlowers.NAME: Mayflowers
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b3 Regeneration on turn #b5

StuffTheSpire:BlackoutCurse.NAME: Blackout Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal 50% less attack damage.

StuffTheSpire:ColdMirror.NAME: Cold Mirror
StuffTheSpire:ColdMirror.FLAVOR: You need at least seven brains to understand this.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you evoke an Orb each combat, channel #b1 Frost.

StuffTheSpire:BottledHeartBeat.NAME: Bottled HeartBeat
StuffTheSpire:BottledHeartBeat.FLAVOR: I I just... over you... a e can't get...
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup choose a card that does not exhaust on it's own. Whenever the card is exhausted, gain #b2 max. HP
Whenever you exhaust
, gain #b2 max. HP

StuffTheSpire:ChainArchetype.NAME: Chain Archetype
StuffTheSpire:ChainArchetype.FLAVOR: Only the cool kids could draw those back in the day.
DESCRIPTIONS: Additional card rewards for the Chain Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
Chain Archetype card

StuffTheSpire:DarkSteelAnvil.NAME: Dark Steel Anvil
StuffTheSpire:DarkSteelAnvil.FLAVOR: Made from steel infused with obsidian.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrades are more effective.

StuffTheSpire:OldFever.NAME: The old fever
StuffTheSpire:OldFever.FLAVOR: And again and again, it's the same old songs.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if your discard pile is larger than your draw pile, discard a card and add a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Choose a card to add into your hand.

StuffTheSpire:Rhapsscallions.NAME: Rhap's Scallions
StuffTheSpire:Rhapsscallions.FLAVOR: Get it? Because, like, scallions are a vegetable?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup remove a card from your deck, then gain max. HP equal to 60 divided by your deck size.
Choose a card to remove from your deck.

DESCRIPTIONS: Additional card rewards for the Shiv Archetype may now appear with a 33% chance.
